title: [Epidemiology] A period of strict social distancing followed by a robust level of testing, contact-tracing and household quarantine could keep COVID-19 within the capacity of the healthcare system while enabling the reopening of economic activities in the absence of herd immunity, finds new Nature study (5 Aug 20)
